Summary: observed a series of lights... slowly.. (near to the ground) seemed to be on a mission...with some sort of intent..or testing is the impression i got! coming from the west drifting east, i ran off my porch and, captured it on video using my phone!
divs: sighting detailsi, was sitting on my porch one peaceful evening, all of a sudden!to the left of me,i saw a set of lights,blinking and traveling slowly, in an easterly direction, coming from the west. it looked as if, some sort of darkness, behind the lights. i said what the,@#$#! i'm looking at something i should'nt be seeing! (i was quite shocked! and glad! other people, could witness this as well!) my wife, and the neighbors with me, said where? i stood up and said, look! and ran off the porch! as it was drifting, with no motor sounds! with lights near to the ground! and a dark blue, comma shaped object..traveling with it! but, it was, miles away from the closer lights, my camera was trained on! it was something none of us had ever seen before! i ran to the corner of the street,pulled out my camera phone! and captured a strange, event unfolding on video! it traveled,towards a busy major street, i just knew..it would cause a panic! but, other than people behind me..in the next blocks the object was going in! i regret now! that i did not follow it..to see it take off! or finish it's task! one of my friends, thinks aliens my be checking on me! maybe!because, back in 1987..late summer, my wife, a friend and i, watched a blue ball of light, fly into view! and it stopped, flutter, pulsate, and zigzag! it blinked,and we knew! it was trying to get our attention! it did!my wife, came outside, saw us looking in the sky, said oh my god! what is that? we told her,thats a ufo! she said sure is! and as if it heard us! moved from a standing\hovering position..shuddered..zigzaged...moved to the right again! and then took off at an angle..and was gone in a second..away from the earth! no clouds, no sound! i wish cell phones..with cameras were around then! we knew we had been allowed to witness something few people get to see! and no one would believe us! i know it was late summer,early fall,of 1987...the second event my cell phone camera recorded the time and date! so i won't forget the facts! maybe? someone could check radar...reports for 10-4-07 i just figured out how, to upload my video to the computer! a week ago! and what i am seeing now! is not! what i saw, with my naked eye! this video needs to be inhanced...an subjected to analysis! i know now! that we are not! alone!
trends: There have been 35 other sightings in toledo
There were no other sightings in toledo on or around October 4th 2007
This sighting has never been favorited.
